name: volmex.finance
introduce: Volmex pioneered the first crypto volatility index and tradable crypto volatility product, volatility token v1. The Volmex Implied Volatility Indices (e.g. EVIV Index, and BVIV Index) track the 30-day implied volatility of Bitcoin and Ether respectively. Volmex is building a perpetual futures exchange, which will be the first venue to trade volatility index perpetual futures.
